snippet: Fernando Cabada has quietly transformed himself into one of best distance runners in the United States, and one of the best Hispanic athletes the country has ever seen.
abstract: Profile of Latino marathoner Fernando Cabada, front-runner in upcoming Boston Marathon; Cabada, whose childhood in Fresno, Calif, was filled with trauma and poverty, has transformed himself into one of best distance runners in United States.
lead_paragraph: Fernando Cabada has quietly transformed himself into one of best distance runners in the United States, and one of the best Hispanic athletes the country has ever seen.

headline.main: A Marathoner Outruns a Childhood of Poverty
headline.print_headline: A Marathoner Outruns a Childhood of Poverty
